head.title: National Briefing | Northwest: Washington: A Murder-Suicide On Campus

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | Northwest: Washington: A Murder-Suicide On Campus

abstract.p: Gunman in Washington kills woman and shoots himself to death at University of Seattle where woman works; gunman was under restraining order forbidding contact with woman (S)

block.p: A gunman killed a woman and shot himself to death at the University of Washington in Seattle, the authorities said. The shooting happened in an office where the woman, 25, worked in a division of the College of Architecture and Urban Planning. Ray Wittmier, assistant chief of police for the university, said the gunman, who was 41 and not affiliated with the university, was under a restraining order forbidding him from having contact with the woman.
